items.title: RFK Jr.’s planned report linking Tylenol to autism crashes shares of parent company Kenvue
items.description: RFK Jr. is preparing a report that will allegedly claim a link between prenatal Tylenol (acetaminophen) use and autism.

items.title: The energy department said wind and solar capacity is ‘worthless’ without sunlight or wind. Elon Musk reminds DoE about batteries: ‘Um… hello?’
items.description: Musk touted a massive energy storage project in Australia designed to stabilize the grid and expand renewable use.

items.title: The one-time ‘Oracle of Wall Street’ who called the 2008 crash sounds the alarm for Gen Z and Millennials in the year ahead
items.description: Meredith Whitney says younger generations face significant financial headwinds.

items.title: Red Sea cable cuts disrupt internet in Asia, Middle East; Houthis deny involvement as Microsoft warns of disruption
items.description: Undersea cable cuts in the Red Sea disrupted internet access in parts of Asia and the Middle East, experts said Sunday, though it wasn't immediately c...

items.title: Vodafone’s new ad proves even influencers can be replaced by AI
items.description: An AI-generated spokesperson talked up a company promotion on TikTok.
